content: DD 350-CA Core drill Heavy-duty diamond coring machine with high-frequency motor and optional auto-feed unit for rig-based coring from 52-500 mm (2-1/16 - 19-11/16”) in diameter ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features Powerful high-frequency motor with electronic speed control for optimum power delivery over the entire diameter range Compatible with the DD AF-CA automatic feed unit that makes drilling a highly efficient and fully automated process Iron Boost: for a quick performance boost with increased torque when drilling through rebar Thanks to IP 55 water spray protection, drilling can be carried out under adverse conditions Operation within the optimum power band, for peak performance and longer core bit life, is easy with the aid of the LED power indicators Applications Drilling through-holes and penetrations Blind holes for setting anchors or post-installed rebar Corner holes for sawing Manhole openings Stitch coring for installing cable trays ### TECHNICAL DATA: Diameter range: 2-1/16 - 19-11/16 in Base material: Concrete, Reinforced concrete Operation mode: Rig-based drilling system Technical Data | Diameter range | 2-1/16 - 19-11/16 in | Base material | Concrete, Reinforced concrete | Operation mode | Rig-based drilling system | Number of gears | 10 | No load RPM | gear 4: 619 rpm; gear 5: 571 rpm; gear 6: 524 rpm; gear 7: 405 rpm; gear 8: 357 rpm; gear 9: 286 rpm | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 31.7 lb | Weight of complete system | 77 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 23.9 x 7.6 x 8.5 in | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 95 dB (A) | 1 | Tri. vibr. value for drilling into concrete (wet) with diamond core A (ah,DD) | 2.5 m/s² | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3536958 - DD350-CA BL 240V complete Cut Assist rig - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 350-CA 240V Diamond coring tool assy - 1x Spacer DD-HD30-SP - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x Chuck DD-BL DD 200 - 1x Drilling stand DD-HD 30 - 1x Wheel set DD-HD30-W - 1x DD AF-CA 240V Autofeed unit assy - 3536962 - DD350-CA BS 240V complete Cut Assi - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 350-CA 240V Diamond coring tool assy - 1x Spacer DD-HD30-SP - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x Chuck DD-BS DD 200 - 1x Wheel set DD-HD30-W - 1x Drilling stand DD-HD 30 - 1x DD AF-CA 240V Autofeed unit assy - 3536957 - DD350-CA BL 240V complete rig - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 350-CA 240V Diamond coring tool assy - 1x Spacer DD-HD30-SP - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x Chuck DD-BL DD 200 - 1x Drilling stand DD-HD 30 - 1x Wheel set DD-HD30-W - 3536960 - DD350-CA BS Motor 240V W/Spacer - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 350-CA 240V Diamond coring tool assy - 1x Spacer DD-HD30-SP - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x Chuck DD-BS DD 200 - 1x Adaptor DD350/500 w/quick connect - 3536956 - DD350-CA BL 240V US motor - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 350-CA 240V Diamond coring tool assy - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x Chuck DD-BL DD 200
